name: Yuriko Yamamoto
learned: Yuriko Yamamoto is one of the best hide and seek players around who loves to hide in the hide and seek game. He is always looking for ways to improve her strategy in hiding so Klauss and Wolfgang cannot find him.
currently: Yuriko Yamamoto is playing a hide and seek game in Smallville with the other 7 people that are hiding. He is thinking of places to hide in Smallville, and is telling everyone to join the game right away and they will all play indefinitely.
lifestyle: Yuriko Yamamoto 0:00 am and plays hide all over Smallville.
